ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clounding
ygData.msgSnippet: The gnoll teeth quest is very good (over the course of the evening I turned in 4) Another one with good experience is the rabid wolf pelt quest. Both times I
ygData.messageBody:
The gnoll teeth quest is very good (over the course of the evening I
turned in 4) Another one with good experience is the rabid wolf pelt quest.
Both times I could see definite movement on the experience bar. I turned
in quite a few of the rabid wolf pelts as well. So I did use experience so
that it was "only" 5 and a half hours for me.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Solusek Ro (Qeynos Hills)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
>Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 9:08 AM

>> I got nearly a full level from turning in 6 gnoll teeth to the guy in S
>> Qeynos. So that certainly helped.
>
> wow... did they up the exp on those small quests a lot or what?
> I never got any exp from those when I was small, I got an item
> like a rusty sword, or a spell, and sometimes a moonstone. Now
> I hear you just get a moonstone.
>
> Harmonic.
